It occurs when the throat muscles intermittently relax and block the airway during sleep. A noticeable sign of obstructive sleep apnea is snoring.
Can it be lethal?

articles.description: You can use food as medicine to help improve your heart health.

articles.author: DTNextVidya
articles.title: Adverse effects of changing seasons on skin - DTNext
articles.description: Besides being the largest organ, our skin is also quite adaptable-when seasons gradually roll on from one to another, it acclimatises to the prevalent one. But even something as adaptable can react adversely when faced with sudden, brutal climate changes.
